title: "Convenience shopping,” means shops, each with a carpet area not exceeding 30 sq
clause_text: "Convenience shopping,” means shops, each with a carpet area not exceeding 30 sq. m except where otherwise indicated and comprising those dealing with day to day requirements, as distinguished from wholesale trade or shopping, provided on the ground and/or first floor of building with internal means of access. It includes-
